name: REZ
author: Roosta
notes: since I started DL, this is the deck I thought was coolest, so I'm glad I was finally able to make it on an (almost) F2P budget. It still does well in the current meta, but you have to be very careful with your plays against SSA. It's a really awesome deck, for sure, and thanks to everyone in the REZ channels for the help, WHAT IS DEAD MAY NEVER DIE
